article_title: Lawsuit Alleges Tennessee Illegally Blocked Health Care
article_text:
Your article was successfully shared with the contacts you provided.

Tennessee has become the first state to face litigation over its Medicaid practices since the start of the Affordable Care Act, and advocacy groups behind a proposed class action accuse state officials of causing dangerous delays in granting coverage to the poor in an act of political spite against the law.
